source:
# File path to your dataset in Azure Data Lake
file_path = 'abfss://bigdata-project@nutritionedudatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nutrition_data/Nutrition__Physical_Activity__and_Obesity_-_Behavioral_Risk_Factor_Surveillance_System.csv'

# Imports
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Load and filter
df = pd.read_csv(file_path)
df_filtered = df[(df['Class'] == 'Fruits and Vegetables') & (df['StratificationCategory1'] == 'Education')]

# Group and average
summary = (
    df_filtered
    .groupby(['YearStart', 'Stratification1', 'Question'])['Data_Value']
    .mean()
    .reset_index()
    .rename(columns={
        'Stratification1': 'Education Level',
        'YearStart': 'Year',
        'Data_Value': 'Average %'
    })
)

# Rename Question to Nutrition Behavior
summary = summary.rename(columns={'Question': 'Nutrition Behavior'})

# Calculate Year-over-Year % Change
summary = summary.sort_values(by=['Education Level', 'Nutrition Behavior', 'Year'])
summary['YoY % Change'] = summary.groupby(['Education Level', 'Nutrition Behavior'])['Average %'].pct_change() * 100

# Plotting
plt.figure(figsize=(14, 6))
sns.set(style='whitegrid')
sns.lineplot(
    data=summary,
    x='Year',
    y='YoY % Change',
    hue='Education Level',
    style='Nutrition Behavior',
    markers=True
)
plt.title('Yearly Percentage Change in Fruit and Vegetable Consumption by Education Level')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Year-over-Year % Change')
plt.legend(title='Education Level / Nutrition Behavior', bbox_to_anchor=(1.05, 1), loc='upper left')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

# Overall biggest increase and drop (any nutrition behavior)
largest_increase = summary.loc[summary['YoY % Change'].idxmax()]
print(f"üìà Highest YoY Increase: {largest_increase['Education Level']} - {largest_increase['Nutrition Behavior']} in {int(largest_increase['Year'])} ({largest_increase['YoY % Change']:.2f}%)")

largest_drop = summary.loc[summary['YoY % Change'].idxmin()]
print(f"üìâ Largest YoY Drop: {largest_drop['Education Level']} - {largest_drop['Nutrition Behavior']} in {int(largest_drop['Year'])} ({largest_drop['YoY % Change']:.2f}%)")

# Specific to Fruits
fruit_data = summary[summary['Nutrition Behavior'].str.contains('fruit', case=False)]
fruit_increase = fruit_data.loc[fruit_data['YoY % Change'].idxmax()]
fruit_drop = fruit_data.loc[fruit_data['YoY % Change'].idxmin()]

print(f"\nüçé Highest YoY Increase (Fruit): {fruit_increase['Education Level']} - {fruit_increase['Nutrition Behavior']} in {int(fruit_increase['Year'])} ({fruit_increase['YoY % Change']:.2f}%)")
print(f"üçè Largest YoY Drop (Fruit): {fruit_drop['Education Level']} - {fruit_drop['Nutrition Behavior']} in {int(fruit_drop['Year'])} ({fruit_drop['YoY % Change']:.2f}%)")

# Specific to Vegetables
veg_data = summary[summary['Nutrition Behavior'].str.contains('vegetable', case=False)]
veg_increase = veg_data.loc[veg_data['YoY % Change'].idxmax()]
veg_drop = veg_data.loc[veg_data['YoY % Change'].idxmin()]

print(f"\nü•¶ Highest YoY Increase (Vegetable): {veg_increase['Education Level']} - {veg_increase['Nutrition Behavior']} in {int(veg_increase['Year'])} ({veg_increase['YoY % Change']:.2f}%)")
print(f"ü•¨ Largest YoY Drop (Vegetable): {veg_drop['Education Level']} - {veg_drop['Nutrition Behavior']} in {int(veg_drop['Year'])} ({veg_drop['YoY % Change']:.2f}%)")

# Convert summary to Spark DataFrame
spark_df = spark.createDataFrame(summary)

# Save to ADLS as CSV
output_path = "abfss://bigdata-project@nutritionedudatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/processed/'Yearly Percentage Change in Fruit and Vegetable Consumption by Education Level"
spark_df.write.mode("overwrite").option("header", "true").csv(output_path)
